result.execSummary:
The defendant Brian Keith Jamerson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take (<=$500), a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Brian Keith Jamerson

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant's Bail Forfeiture Notice returned undeliverable.
Notice of bond forfeiture mailed to defendant; Original in file. ($200.00 signature bond) gj

AS TO COUNT 1
Court ordered defendant to serve 16 DAYS in the House of Correction, with credit for 16 days credit time served. THIS IS A TIME SERVED DISPOSITION. 

Court ordered defendant to pay all mandatory court costs, fees, and surcharges by 11/2/2015. Failure to pay will result in a civil judgment. 

Restitution set at ZERO.

DNA surcharge does not apply due to date of offense. 

Filed, 
Pretrial Incarceration Credit Form and Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief.

Defendant Brian Keith Jamerson in court with attorney Michael Jude.  Defendant Brian Keith Jamerson in custody.  Katherine Halopka-Ivery appeared for the State of Wisconsin. CMC. Parties have reached a resolution. 

AS TO COUNT 1
Defendant waived rights and pled guilty.  Guilty Plea Questionnaire, Addendum, and Elements received and filed.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Parties stipulate to the facts of the complaint as a basis for a guilty plea.  Court found the defendant guilty as charged in the complaint.  Judgment of Conviction entered.
Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 47. lr  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for 09-03-2015 at 08:30 am.
ON court's own motion , Court set bail in the amount of $100.00 cash.

Attorney Michael Jude in court, defendant Brian Keith Jamerson not in court, in custody.  Alyssa M. Schaller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Court ordered bench  warrant cancelled and previous bail reinstated. .
Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued.  COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE JUDGE ON RETURN OF THE BENCH WARRANT.

Attorney Michael Jude in court.  Katherine Halopka-Ivery appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued.  COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE JUDGE ON RETURN OF THE BENCH WARRANT. Court to set bail.
NO REPLY FROM SURETY/DEFENDANT.

JusticePoint Discharge Summary dated June 23, 2015 received and filed.
Clerk:  jms

Attorney Michael Jude in court, defendant Brian Keith Jamerson not in court, in custody.  Katherine Halopka-Ivery appeared for the State of Wisconsin. CMC. Defense requests a Plea and Sentencing date. Court granted defense request. Case adjourned to branch 47.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 26, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Received and Filed, Justice Point Report.
Defendant Bail Forfeiture Notice returned undeliverable.

Court orders defendant TURNED OVER to JUSTICE Point for Supervision.  ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY/DEFENDANT to be monitored by drug testing.
   Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.

Defendant Brian Keith Jamerson in court with attorney Jamie Marie Mcclendon.  Defendant Brian Keith Jamerson in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  hgj.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT.  Scheduling conference scheduled for June 22, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Notice of bond forfeiture mailed to defendant; Original in file. ($250.00 signature bond) ad

Attorney Michael Jude previously in court.  Katherine Halopka-Ivery appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued.  COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Attorney Eric M. Vega in court, defendant Brian Keith Jamerson not in court, in custody.  Katherine Halopka-Ivery appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 47. lr  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for 05-19-2015 at 08:30 am.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  
Defendant to have no contact with: All Dollar Tree  Stores
Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Brian Keith Jamerson in court with attorney Darryl E. Smith.  Defendant Brian Keith Jamerson in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Siefert, Branch 47.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 13, 2015 at 08:30 am.
